text: DC pulsed with either retinal S-antigen or another retinal autoantigen , interphotoreceptor retinoid binding protein ( IRBP ) , were able to stimulate naive T cell proliferation in vitro , but only S-antigen -pulsed DC were able to induce an immune response in vivo and initiate antibody class switching .
